attributes.action: " BRING OUR TROOPS HOME FROM IRAQ....NOW! "
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring them home NOW, or ASAP and let their mission be, to patrol and safeguard British borders. 
WE in the UK need protecting, whilst more importantly, THEY deserve a safer job and opportunity to see and enjoy their families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
